CREATE DATABASE DataExplorationDB 
                COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8

Drop view trip_vw, fares_vw

create view trip_vw as 
SELECT
     *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://eliszdel7xj7vkkkkpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/public/trip-data.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) 
WITH(
        [medallion] nvarchar(4000),
        [hack_license] nvarchar(4000),
        [vendor_id] nvarchar(4000),
        [rate_code] bigint,
        [store_and_fwd_flag] nvarchar(4000),
        [pickup_datetime] datetime2(0),
        [dropoff_datetime] datetime2(0),
        [passenger_count] bigint,
        [trip_time_in_secs] bigint,
        [trip_distance] float,
        [pickup_longitude] float,
        [pickup_latitude] float,
        [dropoff_longitude] float,
        [dropoff_latitude] float
    )AS [result]
WHERE
    trip_distance > 0 AND
    passenger_count > 0 AND
    pickup_longitude != 0 AND
    store_and_fwd_flag is not NULL


create view fares_vw as 
SELECT
     *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://eliszdel7xj7vkkkkpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/public/fares-data.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) 
    WITH(
        [medallion] nvarchar(4000),
        [hack_license] nvarchar(4000),
        [vendor_id] nvarchar(4000),
        [pickup_datetime] datetime2(0),
        [payment_type] nvarchar(4000),
        [fare_amount] float,
        [surcharge] float,
        [mta_tax] float,
        [tip_amount] float,
        [tolls_amount] float,
        [total_amount] float
    )AS [result]
    WHERE
        total_amount > 0

SELECT 
    f.medallion, f.hack_license, f.vendor_id, f.pickup_datetime, f.fare_amount, f.tip_amount, f.tolls_amount, total_amount,
    t.dropoff_datetime, t.passenger_count, t.trip_time_in_secs, t.trip_distance, t.pickup_longitude, t.pickup_latitude,
    t.dropoff_longitude,t.dropoff_latitude
FROM 
    fares_vw f, trip_vw t 
WHERE 
    f.medallion = t.medallion AND
    f.hack_license = t.hack_license AND
    f.vendor_id = t.vendor_id AND
    f.pickup_datetime = t.pickup_datetime
